string.name: uni
string.b: UNIVERSITY OF THE WEST OF SCOTLAND

resources.string: Released in 1993, Adobe After Effects is a digital visual effects, motion graphics, and compositing application developed by Adobe Systems and used in the post-production process of film making, video games and television production. Among other things, After Effects can be used for keying, tracking, compositing, and animation.

Released in 1999, Vegas Pro is a video editing software package for non-linear editing. Vegas features real-time multitrack video and audio editing on unlimited tracks, resolution-independent video sequencing, complex effects and compositing tools.

Released in 2011, Video Star is a music video creation tool developed by the Frontier Design Group. It records video only, and not audio, with numerous onboard special effects and upgrades available with in-app purchases.

Released in 2019, Alight Motion is the first professional Motion Design app for smartphones, bringing professional-quality animation, motion graphics, visual effects, video editing, video compositing and more.
